intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Urban Atlas products, specifically covering the 2006, 2012, and 2018 reference years. It provides detailed guidance for service providers involved in the production of standardised land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps within the Urban Atlas programme. The manual outlines specifications, mapping conventions, and nomenclature to ensure congruent, comparable, and high-quality Urban Atlas products across Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) in Europe and beyond, also describing the additional Street Tree Layer and Digital Height Model products.
